titles.title: Love, proved on the cross of shame

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love, proved on the cross of shame, Love, Worthy of God’s great Name, Love, eternally the same, Wins a heart like mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Grace, knowing my every sin, Grace, dying to make me clean, Grace, that ran to bring me in, Suits a heart like mine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace, still as the “Sea of glass”, Peace, knowing the judgement’s past, Peace, that will for ever last, Calms a heart like mine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Joy, fruit of a Father‘s kiss, Joy, foretaste of heavenly bliss, Joy, that springs from love like this, Fills a heart like mine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, while in this world below, Still more of Thy love I’d know, So shall sweeter praises flow From a heart like mine.{/lang-eng}
